short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize the Web, Save Your Notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform lengthy webpages into clear and concise bullet points with just a click. Bullets is your go-to Chrome extension for summarizing web content quickly and effectively, saving you time and effort.

No ads, no tracking, open source.
 
**Features:**

‚ú® Summarize full webpages or selected text instantly.
üìã Clean and organized bullet point format for easy reading.
üëâ Convenient context menu integration‚Äîjust right-click and summarize!
üìé Copy your notes to clipboard.
üíæ Save your notes.
üåô Auto dark mode support.
üîç Quickly access your saved notes and their original URL.
üìù Search your notes using title, content, or URL.
üìö Perfect for students, researchers, professionals, or anyone who needs to digest information quickly.

Make your browsing more productive and efficient with Bullets!

**Changelog**
---
V1.8
- Nice blur effects for popup
- Improved dark mode 
- List items separation, background
- Finally fixed chunking/parsing bug that caused words to stick to each other
- Improved code structure, more maintainable
- Completely changed summary instructions, way better now!
- Switched over to Gemini Flash 2 for better summary generation 

V1.7.2
- Improved instruction set : summaries are now much more interesting to read! 

V1.7.1
- Fixed bug causing conflict
- Code optimizations

V1.7
- Added links to saved notes that were loaded in the popup, less back & forth
- Improved styling
- Improved dark mode
- Better CSS override
- Fixed : wasn't searching through summary content as expected
- Fixed : note positioning and sizing is now consistent
- Massive code optimization & refactoring

V1.6
- Display total time saved by using Bullets!
- Search through notes : title, content & URL 
- URL button on notes : quickly access the original link of your saved note
- UI improvements accross the board
- Reliability fixes. 

V1.5.0
- No API key required anymore! it's on me :) 
- Resize your note!
- Save notes to memory - display them through the extension icon in Chrome
- Cleaner layout, actual HTML bullet points & titles!

V1.4.2
- Pin summaries, so you can click elsewhere on the page!
- Summaries are cached while you're on the page
- Dark mode improvements
- Note doesn't shift anymore while generating the summary, fixed height, is less responsive because of it, but easier on the eyes

V1.3.1
- Auto dark mode
- Small text optimizations

V1.3
- Improved responsive design
- Added time saved calculator
- Summarized title appears upon content summary finalization

V1.2
- Text streaming implemented
- Actually displays bullet points now
- Responsive design (to be improved)
- Improved styling
- Improved token usage 

V1.1
- Drag the post-it anywhere on the page
- Improved styling
- Copy to clipboard feature added
- Added title to post-it
- Better instructions in popup
- More reliable display & summarizing of information

V1.0 
- Initial release
